page.title: 03Land use
page.content: Apart from the village of{Bedlinog the land use pattern of our area surveyed is predominantly rural in character.Broadly,the land in the east and north is open grazing land which coincides with the common land on Gelligaer Common and is graded by the Ministry of Agriculture as Grade 5 agricultural land.The remaining area is mainly enclosed grazing land<Grade 4 and 5>and appears to us in good condition and well maintained. There are several small areas of deciduous woodlands scattered about our area.
